rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space leading into the living room. Decorated following Vastu principles ensuring good energy flow.
A spacious dining area aligned to the east for positive energy, with a large table and chairs.
Functional colonial kitchen design with modern appliances while keeping traditional elements. Positioned ideally to the south as per Vastu for prosperity.
Dedicated living space for the household staff, located conveniently on the ground floor.
Small restroom facility near the entrance for guests and quick access.

openings.details: Large entrance door aligned to enhance Vastu energy.
Spacious balcony for the living room area providing a view and ventilation.

rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with a large balcony facing east, ensuring positive energy as per Vastu. Includes ample storage and a dressing area.
Comfortable guest bedroom with its own balcony for relaxation. Designed to cater to visiting family members.
Modern bathroom with essential fixtures and ventilation, placed appropriately to maintain privacy and comfort.

openings.details: Spacious balcony for the master bedroom, providing a serene view and ample ventilation.
Balcony attached to the guest bedroom with optimal sun exposure.
